Posts.Content: I just got diagnosed. I've searched all over the net, but I can't find an answer. It's a silly question, but I still cry over how traumatic getting a catheter was 6 years ago and having my breasts exposed these past weeks has been horrifying. Does anyone know if I could wear like erm "tittie covers" those little circle things that cover your nipples or maybe tape? I'm scared to ask my doctor, because it seems so stupid, but I know it'd make me feel a million times better if I could cover them. Thanks, to whomever, if whomever, replies.
Posts.Signature: Reece - 19 - Shortly Diagnosed - Not menopausal - I'm so lost when it comes to exact type - Stage I - Treatments: surgery, radiation, and chemotherapy
Posts.Title: radiation of breast, nipples?

Posts.Content: Thanks. Obviously not the answer I wanted, but thanks. I guess having you nipples on show isn't so bad if my cancer goes away.
Posts.Title: radiation of breast, nipples?
